item.title: I can't reach a published container port from outside of the host!
item.author: Jan Rotter
item.description: After a seemingly fresh install of docker I couldn’t access an exposed container port. This post documents the troubleshooting process and the culprit.

item.title: My Basic MikroTik hEX S Setup
item.author: Jan Rotter
item.description: How I configured a MikroTik hEX S router with VLANs to separate different parts of my home network.
